tag.description: Tag handler to include a facelet multiple times with different contextes (objects from "value").

attribute.description: The relative path to a XHTML file to be include one or multiple times.
attribute.name: src

attribute.description: Objects which should be available in the included XHTML files. This attribute can be either of type java.util.List or array. If it is null, the tag handler works as a standard ui:include.
attribute.name: value

attribute.description: The name of the parameter which points to an object of each iteration over the given value.
attribute.name: name
